Projects

  • iServiceDog

    WP, SEMRush, AWeber, Thrive, Yoast SEO, Long Tail Pro, Market Samurai

    First niche website for service dogs and their owners. Lot's of SEO keyword and domain research went into the making of this one. Hoping to grow site with SEO and content marketing to be the authority site in the niche. Check it out!

  • Jackrabbit Mobile

    C#, .NET, Angular, Ruby on Rails, SQL, Webpack

    Set up Ruby On Rails app with Angular FE. Configured .NET Gateway app to act as interpreter for Microsoft SDK. Grid FE with Angular Material and Bootstrap.

  • Tripchamp

    C#, .NET, AWS, DocumentDB, Angular, SQL

    Back-end data transformation and serializtion/deserialization in C#. Used AJAX and NUnit testing along with classic OOP programming. Set-up custom Load Balancer in AWS to scale project from small-startup to multinational company (India, England) C#.NET MVC App with custom normalization code to map API agents. Led tech integration of 3rd party code with both SOAP and REST API's

  • GAJobsATX

    MEAN, Angular, Express, MongoDB, Node, Bootstrap

    Job posting app for current students and alumni of General Assembly, go ahead and post a few jobs. The app has full CRUD capabilities so you can always delete :)

  • Doctor Location App

    Node, MongoDB, Express, Bootstrap, JQuery, Heroku, Leaflet, Mapbox, Google Geocode

    Proud of this one! Full-Stack MEAN Application from zero to hero. App for medical insurance providers to see location and number of medical practitioners around any zipcode in the world.

  • Asteroid Defender (Firefox/Safari only)

    C#, Javascript, Unity

    Designed Asteroid Defender to be a classic top-down arcade style shooter. I wanted to learn C# as an introduction to the .NET framework and what better way to do it then to make a game your friends can fight over playing? I learned alot about OOP capabilities and the fundamentals of game design.

  • BarTinder

    Node, MongoDB, Angular, Express, Bootstrap, JQuery, Animate, Heroku

    Ever go to a bar that was dead? Not anymore. BarTinder counts the number of patrons at each bar and displays the number and capacity of a random bar to a potential cleint looking for a fun place to go. Problem Solved!

  • Point Break Calculator

    Javascript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, BitBalloon

    An homage to the greatest movie of all time, the original pointbreak. Not this awful looking remake that's coming out.

  • RecordKeeper

    Ruby, Ruby on Rails, JQuery, Javascript, Bootstrap, PostgreSQL, Active Record, Heroku

    App for hording record collectors to browse and trade with others, in a community of vinyl enthusiasts.
